Topic.Title: I TOLD ya that Windows on ARM was a DUD 1 year ago. ARM just wouldn't cut it

Message.Msg: RT out sells Pro over 2 to 1... BUFFOON !!!! Getanid61, Have you checked the Bestseller rankings on Bestbuy or Amazon lately...i.e. in the last month? Surface Pro is even pulling ahead of some Kindle and Apple models.RT models are not even in the 1st 15 at Bestbuy anymore since the Pro Surface has been released in Feb---4 months after Surface RT. Remember what Nvidia's CEO said at the investor conference on March 19th....."I am disappointed in Surface RT sales, We expected to sell a lot more." And what is with this Google is selling 3 Chromebooks....Two of which are Intel X86 and One is ARM. Weird....very weird...what does Google know that the Tech Press doesn't?

Message.Title: Windows 8 Touchscreen---Impact on ARM 10 Inch Tablets
Message.Msg: There seems to be a whole lot of Windows 8 X86 Touchscreen hybrids...use as a tablet or as a PC with keyboard....sizes 10.6 to 11.6 inches just now coming out. Some are selling for a little over $650. Really good ones too. This is bound to really hurt the larger ARM tablets. Some analysts are saying it will kill them. 7-8 inches is the sweet spot in Tablets for ARM right now. But who knows later on this year.we should see X86 in the smaller tablets.....Premium luxury of course. And what is with Intel porting Android to X86 and the welcome embrace from Google in Chromebooks....previously an ARM exclusive.
so what the OS be? Android? Facebook's own? Firefox?

To anybody objective, 'gaming' is just another word for 'smoke', smoke to hide the $100M/Q Tegra loses. Is Tegra going to break even during this life-time?

Message.Title: Surface Pro Launches in China 4/2
Message.Msg: Monica Chen, Taipei; Adam Hwang, DIGITIMES [Friday 29 March 2013] Microsoft, following the launch of the10.6-inch Surface RT in the China market, will launch the 10.6-inch Windows 8 Surface Pro there on April 2 at a retail price of CNY6,500 (US$1,045) for the 64GB version and CNY7,300 for 128GB, according to sources with Taiwan's supply chain. Surface RT is priced at CNY3,688-4,488 plus CNY800 for a touch cover, the source indicated. According to previous estimation by market observers, Surface RT and Surface Pro shipments to the global market would have reached one million units and 500,000 units respectively so far since their launch, but the actual volume for the two models so far is estimated at about one million units in total, the sources said. Viewing that Microsoft has not placed additional orders for Surface RT, an estimated one million units of Surface RT remain in the inventory, the sources indicated. Microsoft has talked with partners about developing second-generation Surface models, but those partners have generally been conservative, the sources noted, adding that Microsoft is inviting notebook and chip vendors to co-develop tablets based on Windows-ARM platform but those vendors have been reluctant." __________________________________________________________________ Note: Surface RT launched 10/26/12, Surface Pro launched 2/8/13. First overseas expansion for Surface Pro

Deeply, Deeply, Disturbted, Little Mind That You Appear to Be, Scapegoating an entire group of people for your own lack of fulfillment, will get you less than nowhere. Find a life. Cease blaming others for your own travails and embittered disillusionments.
